overview: D-Day, 1944. Carlton Pilecki, paratrooper of the 506th Regiment, is alone and lost behind German lines. His objective will be to find his comrades and thus be able to complete his mission. To do so, he will start a path of no return through unknown territory in which, step by step will guide him to his destiny.
tagline: D-Day. Lost and alone behind enemy lines, a young American paratrooper will soon discover that his mission has changed.
title: Point Jordan
